item.description:
Hello Everyone! Welcome to the NH rock climbing meetup! I live in Barrington, NH (about 15 min from Dover) and joined the Boston meet up, however they meet far from my house and it was hard to meet up. I decided WE needed a meetup closer to NH. After seeing how many others were thinking the same thing I wanted to step up and begin one!
I have a climbing gym in the barn behind my house (how convenient for meet ups!) There are four walls, several ropes and hundreds of holds, lots to play on! I have gear to share if you don't have any. The gym is run as a non profit ( donations are accepted) and a signed waiver is required. Don't worry if you don't know how to belay I can teach you.

I am hoping to meet some new members at this meeting and see returning faces! Also I am looking for anyone interested in being asst. organizers, coming to this meeting will help.
Looking forward to meeting you all! :)



Another note: I do have a child and will be hosting some climbs w/ families included. It's fun to include the little ones once in a while so if you have children look for these meetups.
item.how_to_find_us: One and half miles down Scruton Pond Rd is #194 Maroon ranch w/ large barn in back. Come in driveway or park out front. Come out back through fence and entrance is right there.
item.why: You will love it because you will meet others who share the love of climbing. It's always more fun when you climb with other people!
item.name: The NH Rock Climbing July Meeting
